definition: gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms

sentences.english: Lung cancer and malignant mesothelioma are more common with asbestos inhalation and asbestosis.
sentences.chinese: 肺癌和恶性间皮瘤亦和石绵吸入及石绵沉着病有关。

sentences.english: Because mesothelioma is a rare disease, many doctors are not familiar with it.
sentences.chinese: 因为间皮瘤是一个罕见病，许多医生对它不熟悉。

sentences.english: Colonic invasion of malignant peritoneal mesothelioma.
sentences.chinese: 腹腔恶性间皮瘤的结肠侵入。

sentences.english: Smoking does not cause mesothelioma or asbestosis.
sentences.chinese: 吸烟不引起间皮瘤或绵。

sentences.english: Cancer thinning out case-hardened organization in these happened Be to thin out the skin tumour.
sentences.chinese: 发生在这些间皮组织的恶性肿瘤就是间皮瘤。

sentences.english: Malignant pleural mesothelioma (MPM) is an uncommon, but no longer rare cancer.
sentences.chinese: 恶性肋膜间皮瘤是个不常见却又不再罕见的癌症。

sentences.english: One of diffuse malignant mesothelioma of the chest tumor one of the worst prognosis.
sentences.chinese: 其中弥漫型恶性间皮瘤是胸部预后最坏的肿瘤之一。

sentences.english: Suspicious for malignant pleural mesothelioma patients, CT examination is most useful.
sentences.chinese: 对于可疑恶性胸膜间皮瘤的病人，CT检查最为有用。

sentences.english: Almost all mesotheliomas or mesothelial cells are negative.
sentences.chinese: 几乎所有的间皮瘤或间皮细胞是阴性的。

sentences.english: Objective To assess the diagnosis of thoracoscopy in pleural mesothelioma.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价胸腔镜检查对胸膜间皮瘤的诊断价值。

sentences.english: The clinical features and combined image findings of mesotheliomas were described.
sentences.chinese: 描述了间皮瘤的临床及综合影像表现特点。

sentences.english: A bronchoscopy may be performed if pleural mesothelioma is suspected.
sentences.chinese: 如果怀疑胸膜间皮瘤，也可用支气管镜检查。

sentences.english: Mesothelioma and lung cancer are very different diseases.
sentences.chinese: 间皮瘤和肺癌是非常不同的疾病。
